content.text:
# 18th Sur Awards

The 18th Sur Awards ceremony, presented by the Argentine Academy of Cinematography Arts and Sciences, was held at the  in Buenos Aires on 26 August 2024. The gala was hosted by Dalia Gutmann, and it was broadcast on TNT and Max.
Nominations and winners
The winners and nominees are listed as follows:
